structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: From time to time, the local legislative body may accept an instrument whereby the term of any scenic easement is extended in the same manner as is provided for the acceptance of an instrument originally creating a scenic easement. Upon the acceptance thereof the same shall be recorded in the office of the county clerk and copies filed with the property valuation administrator and the local planning commission.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 136, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 8.
